2.text: Pasindu is a student of Kajulanda M.V. He has always done well in his studies and various extra-curricular activities of the school-especially in sports. Recently, he got through the GCE (A/L) examination with three A passes. So, the school organized a felicitation ceremony for him. The following is the interview that Charith, a member of the school media unit, had with Pasindu just after the ceremony.

3.text: Charith: Good morning, Pasindu! Today is a special day for you. Tell me, What are your thoughts at the moment?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='t͡ʃarit'>Charith</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> Good <break time='200ms'/> morning, <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='pasindu'>Pasindu</phoneme>! <break time='200ms'/> Today <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> special <break time='200ms'/> day <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> you. <break time='200ms'/> Tell <break time='200ms'/> me, <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> thoughts <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> moment? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Pasindu: I feel really happy and honoured. In fact, this is one of the happiest days of my life.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='pasindu'>Pasindu</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> feel <break time='200ms'/> really <break time='200ms'/> happy <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> honoured. <break time='200ms'/> In <break time='200ms'/> fact, <break time='200ms'/> this <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> one <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> happiest <break time='200ms'/> days <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> life. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: Charith: You're a role model to all of us. You have been a senior prefect, the captain of the school volleyball team and a school cadet. With all that, you managed to get through your A/L s with flying colours. How did you do all this?
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='t͡ʃarit'>Charith</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> You're <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> role <break time='200ms'/> model <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> all <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> us. <break time='200ms'/> You <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> been <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> senior <break time='200ms'/> prefect, <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> captain <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> volleyball <break time='200ms'/> team <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> cadet. <break time='200ms'/> With <break time='200ms'/> all <break time='200ms'/> that, <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> managed <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> through <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> A/L <break time='200ms'/> s <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> flying <break time='200ms'/> colours. <break time='200ms'/> How <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> all <break time='200ms'/> this? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
